archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.2.6e: e) applying easily recognisable labels, but only in approved circumstances where this will not attract the attention of malicious actors (e.g. for top secret laptops that have to stay in restricted areas, for some hard drives or for network cables)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
